name: Dr. Priya Sharma
summary: Data Scientist with PhD in Machine Learning and 5 years of industry experience. Expert in building predictive models, deploying ML systems at scale, and translating complex analyses into actionable business insights.

experience.title: Senior Data Scientist
responsibilities: Developed recommendation system serving 100M+ users, increasing conversion by 18%
Built fraud detection model reducing false positives by 40% using XGBoost and neural networks
Led A/B testing framework implementation for data-driven product decisions
Mentored 2 junior data scientists and conducted ML training sessions
Published research on scalable ML pipelines at internal tech conference

experience.title: Data Scientist
responsibilities: Developed predictive models for patient readmission risk using Python and TensorFlow
Created ETL pipelines processing 10M+ medical records using PySpark
Collaborated with clinicians to ensure model interpretability and ethical AI practices
Reduced model training time by 50% through distributed computing optimization

experience.title: Machine Learning Research Intern
responsibilities: Researched novel deep learning architectures for natural language understanding
Co-authored paper on transfer learning published at NeurIPS 2019

education.thesis: Efficient Transfer Learning for Low-Resource Natural Language Tasks

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Engineering

publications: Sharma, P. et al. (2019). 'Transfer Learning for Low-Resource NLP'. NeurIPS.
Sharma, P. & Lee, J. (2021). 'Scalable ML Pipelines in Healthcare'. JMLR.
